original_text: (There was never anyone like Ahab, who sold himself to do evil in the eyes of the Lord, urged on by Jezebel his wife.
korean_text: 예로부터 아합과 같이 그 자신을 팔아 여호와 앞에서 악을 행한 자가 없음은 그를 그의 아내 이세벨이 충동하였음이라

sentences.original_text: There was never anyone like Ahab
sentences.korean_translation: 아합과 같은 사람은 한 번도 없었다

sentences.original_text: who sold himself to do evil
sentences.korean_translation: 악을 행하기 위해 자신을 판 사람

sentences.original_text: in the eyes of the Lord
urged on by Jezebel his wife
